review: This is a great product, when it works properly. The main issue is that every time you pick up your phone or tablet, it has to reconnect. This often takes several seconds, in which you can't pause or do anything. Many times it just never connects. Your only option is to back out, reconnect and start over. Some apps I've tried, like Vudu don't work at all. Not sure what the issue is there. Also, forget about screen casting. I have the galaxy s5. I've gotten it to work once. But never again. Connects and then drops after a moment. This is with three different routers and trying all different settings. Casting from a pc using chrome is only slightly better. Supposedly this is in beta, but it's been out for at least a year.

review: Great product, great price, and gives you pretty ultimate convenience. While I wouldn't put this up there with Apple TV, Roku, or the Amazon Fire, I do like this product and have given several out as gifts. Everyone, including myself, seems to be satisfied with what this product is capable of. Although it may lack the functionality of the other products I listed, it still works well.
